org.hps.conditions.ecal

Class EcalConditionsConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.conditions.ecal.EcalConditionsConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionsConverter<EcalConditions>

    public class EcalConditionsConverter
extends Object
implements ConditionsConverter<EcalConditions>
    This class loads all ECAL conditions into an EcalConditions object from the database, based on the current run number known by the conditions manager.
    See Also:
    EcalConditions, EcalChannel, EcalGain, EcalCalibration, EcalBadChannel, EcalTimeShift
